name: Marble Maze Run
description: This is a marble maze game that I created inspired by a childhood game I used to play, Run. The player is a pink ball, which the user controls with the up, down, left, and right arrow keys. I created 3 levels, each increasing a little bit in difficulty. The main objective is to pass each level by collecting all the jewels and getting to the green gate (which takes you to the next level). The player wins after completing level 3. For aesthetics, I based it on Run and used neon colors with a starry night sky as the background.
